message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is quite a bit higher for me. How about we settle at $18,000?
I'm still not convinced that $18,000 is a fair price. I'm willing to pay up to $14,000 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?
